# Value

**Associated Type**

The type of value animated by this keyframes type

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Value = Self.Body.Value
```

## Creating a keyframe

- **body**: The composition of content that comprise the keyframes.
- **Body**: The type of keyframes representing the body of this type.
